channel.title: umijs on Paramita
channel.description: Recent content in umijs on Paramita

item.title: umi4设置title keyword description
item.description: umijs升级到v4之后原来v3通过修改src/pages/document.ejs文件来设置title,keyword,description,favicon的方法 失效 了 新版本v4可以通过配置来修改 在config/config.ts中defineConfig方法添加字段 title: "title", metas: [ { name: 'keywords', content: 'keywords' }, { name: 'description', content: 'description' }, ],
